response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (18 years old)", "medium", "Being a young adult can be associated with higher impulsivity and risk-taking behaviors, which may slightly elevate recidivism risk."],
    ["Gender (Female)", "low", "Females statistically tend to have lower rates of recidivism compared to males."],
    ["Race (White)", "low", "Race by itself is not strongly correlated with recidivism risk in this context."],
    ["Criminal History (2 arrests, no conviction)", "medium", "While there are few arrests and no convictions, any criminal contact can contribute to recidivism risk."],
    ["Substance Use (Marijuana and cocaine use in past four years)", "medium", "Past drug use increases the risk of recidivism due to potential for substance-related behaviors."],
    ["Employment Stability (Held 4 jobs during the year)", "medium", "Frequent job changes may indicate instability, which can be a risk factor for recidivism."],
    ["Living Situation (Living alone)", "medium", "Living alone may reduce social support and increase risk, though it is one of several factors."],
    ["Educational Attainment (High School Diploma, not enrolled in college)", "medium", "A high school education is baseline; lack of further education may limit opportunities and influence risk."],
    ["Family Background (Lived with both biological parents until a young age in an urban area)", "low", "A stable early family environment typically provides a protective effect against later criminal behavior."],
    ["Religious Belief (Believes God has a role in her life events)", "low", "Religious belief can serve as a protective factor and lower the risk of recidivism."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 65
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old female who identifies herself as White. She has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted. She is 5 feet 6 inches and weighs 180 lbs. She has never been married and is currently living alone. She has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. She has held 4 jobs during the year. She has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, she lived with both of her biological parents in a household of size 4, in an urban area. She considers that God has something to do with what happens to her personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
